name: Robot Escape (DonQuixote)
description:
THEME - We interpreted the theme "Let There Be Chaos" and made a game that would be chaotic and a little challenging. Since player bullets are able to hurt the player and that every bullet bounces off of walls, the scene can get quite chaotic. 

 MUSIC - The music we used in this game was made by Goose Ninja. Here is the link to the asset pack: https://gooseninja.itch.io/space-music-pack
